# Driving Simulators
## Title
Driving Simulators

## Contract Details

| **Field**             | **Value**                                                                               |
| -------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Reference No.        | PW-__QT-015-29093                                                                 |
| Solicitation No.     | M7594-221048/B                                                                |
| Amendment No.        | 1                                                                                   |
| Publication Date	| 2023-06-16                                                                  |
| Tender Closing Date  | 2023-07-24T14:00:00                                                            |
| Expected Contract   | None                                                                                  |
| Tender Status        | Expiré                                                                                  |

## Industry Feedback Notice

Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is requesting industry feedback regarding the Driver Training Simulators Project, for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Training Center (Depot Division).

This project aims to procure driving simulators for the training center. Interested suppliers may submit a bid for this project.

Key information regarding the project can be found in Annex A, Questions for Industry.

## Contact Information

* Name: Inger Jacobs
* Email: inger.jacobs@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (873) 353-7039 
* Address: Place du Portage III, 8C2
* Province: Quebec
* Postal Code: K1A 0S5
